boardgame.name: Street Masters
boardgame.description: THE GAMEPLAY_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Street Masters is a 1-4 player cooperative miniatures board game inspired by classic fighting video games. Featuring over 65 highly detailed miniatures, unique decks for fighters _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; enemies, custom dice, and lightning-fast gameplay, Street Masters lets players match up powerful fighters against villainous organizations in a wide array of exciting scenarios. Designed by Adam Sadler and Brady Sadler, the game offers modular and elegant gameplay set in a unique and exciting world of brutal combat._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;THE STORY_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Warriors from around the world, known for their legendary fighting abilities and skills, receive mysterious invitations to participate in a martial arts tournament. During the tournament, the organization surrounding it reveals their true identity _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash; The Kingdom _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash; and their purpose to recruit fighters to join their militia or enslave those against them. While several of these warriors made it out in time, many were never heard from again._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Five years later, a government project called _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;Street Masters_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; initiates in order to counter-act the war against The Kingdom, now having divided and seized control over the world by several of its factions. Those who join the Street Masters project must work together to take down each faction, crippling parts of The Kingdom before they're able to launch their end game._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

Complete Kickstarter + Twin Tiger Expansion _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Redemption Pack! This listing is for the complete Kickstarter Pledge of Street Masters (which includes lots of Kickstarter Exclusive additional content) Plus the Twin Tiger Expansion and the Redemption Pack Expansion! Get the ultimate Street Masters Collection and get it fast! Free Express postage within the UK on this listing. Street Masters: Rise of the Kingdom Street Masters: Rise of the Kingdom is a 1-4 player cooperative miniatures board game that includes over 65 highly detailed miniature figures! The game combines the concept of a tactical combat board game with the flexibility of an intricate card game. Acclaimed designers by Adam and Brady Sadler have developed a streamlined system that focuses on modularity and action, with fighters, bosses, rivals, allies, and stages forming a _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;sandbox_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; for players to mix and match, creating their own epic showdowns. The game offers both an action packed _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Arcade Mode_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; where players completely customize their own experience with any combination of fighters, bosses, and stages, as well as a narrative campaign _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Story Mode_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; where the fighters_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039; victories, defeats, and choices help unravel the lore of the game. In _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Story Mode_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; victory means helpful perks, while defeat inflicts dangerous penalties. Legend of Oni Kickstarter Exclusive Expansion: Street Masters Legend of Oni Expansion introduces new enemies, unique stage designs, and a storyline that dives into the ancient lore that haunts some of your favourite characters of the series. Since Street Masters: Rise of the Kingdom is an extremely modular game, you can mix and match these Legend of Oni stages and enemy decks with any combination from your core game. When you hear us say each game you play can be a completely different experience, it absolutely can! Components: 17 Miniatures 2 Double-Sided Map Tiles 4 Stage Decks (87 cards) 1 Enemy Deck 1 Story Deck 5 Card Dividers 17 Snap-On Bases, 81 Tokens Stretch Goals: Since Street Masters: Rise of the Kingdom is an extremely modular game, you can mix and match these Legend of Oni stages and enemy decks with any combination from your core game. When you hear us say each game you play can be a completely different experience, it absolutely ca Components:13 Miniatures 3 Fighter Decks (25 cards per fighter, 75 cards total) Ally/Rivals 1 Double-Sided Map Tile 2 Stage Decks (20 cards per stage, 40 cards total) 1 Enemy Deck 1 Story Decks (9 cards total) 81 Tokens 6 Card Dividers Twin Tiger Expansion: Street Masters Twin Tiger Expansion is a tribute to the anniversary of our favourite arcade games and other classic beat _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;em ups, join Axel and Rhys as they take down the Onyx League plaguing Ransom City. Since Street Masters: Rise of the Kingdom is an extremely modular game, you can mix and match these Legend of Oni stages and enemy decks with any combination from your core game. When you hear us say each game you play can be a completely different experience, it absolutely Since Street Masters: Rise of the Kingdom is an extremely modular game, you can mix and match these Twin Tiger stages, fighters, hero story decks, and enemy decks with any combination from your core game. When you hear us say each game you play can be a completely different experience, it absolutely can! Components: 16 Miniatures 2 Fighter Decks (25 cards per fighter, 50 cards total) 2 Ally/Rivals 1 Double-Sided Map Tile 2 Stage Decks (21 cards per stage, 42 cards total) 1 Enemy Deck 3 Story Decks (39 cards total) 17 Snap-On Bases 81 Tokens 5 Card Dividers Redemption Pack Expansion: You_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ve defeated the Bosses...Now play them as fighters! What do Ah Long, Juan, Dmitri, Kemono, Jackal, and Shadow have in common? With this pack, they_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll all be playable fighters in the Game! Each of the 6 fighters come with their own 25 card decks and 13 card Hero Story Deck to compliment their new storyline as a Global Gladiator. That_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s a total of 232 cards to use with the boss minis in the Street Masters core game! Since Street Masters: Rise of the Kingdom is an extremely modular game, you can mix and match these Legend of Oni stages and enemy decks with any combination from your core game.
